data.name: Pickleball Pro
data.description:
Early Access Alert: Unleash your inner Pickleball Pro!

Available Now:

Dive into specialized mini-games designed to master the art of dinks, drops, and powerful slams.

Test your skills against our 8.0 DUPR practice wallâ€”your ultimate sparring partner that never gets tired.

Harness the power of a fully customizable ball machine. Engineer the perfect shot, set the spin, angle, and speed, then let it rip!

Coming Soon:

Get ready to face off in high-stakes single-player and multiplayer matches. Scheduled for release in 2024. NOTE: These modes are under development and not included in the current Early Access package.

ðŸ”¥Pricing Alert: The value-packed Early Access price is a limited-time offer. Upon the release of more content including single-player and multi-player modes in 2024, the game's price will jump considerably. Get in now to enjoy future upgrades at no extra cost!
